contextId.occurrenceNote: The bronze would be refined first and then polished. Alternate translation: "like bronze that has been purified in a hot furnace and polished" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-events]])
contextId.glQuote: like polished bronze, like bronze that had been refined in a furnace

contextId.occurrenceNote: The person would need to break the seals in order to open the scroll. Alternate translation: "Who is worthy to break the seals and open the scroll?" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-events]])
contextId.quote: τίς ἄξιος ἀνοῖξαι τὸ βιβλίον, καὶ λῦσαι τὰς σφραγῖδας αὐτοῦ
contextId.glQuote: Who is worthy to open the scroll and break its seals?
